title: Prohibits unused private fields
description: Prohibits writing private fields that are not used

parameters.name: basicOffset
parameters.description: How many spaces to use for new indentation level

parameters.name: braceAdjustment
parameters.description: How far braces should be indented when on the next line

parameters.name: caseIndent
parameters.description: How many spaces to indent a case label

parameters.name: throwsIndent
parameters.description: How far a throws clause should be indented when on next line

parameters.name: arrayInitIndent
parameters.description: How many spaces to indent an array initialisation when on next line

parameters.name: lineWrappingIndentation
parameters.description: How far continuation line should be indented when line-wrapping is present

parameters.name: forceStrictCondition
parameters.description: Force strict condition in line wrapping case. If value is true, line wrap indent have to be same as lineWrappingIndentation parameter
